title: Jonathan Bush, Co-Founder Of Athenahealth
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Jonathan Bush, co-founder of Athenahealth, a company that helps doctors manage patient's medical records. Harris also speaks with Dan Yates, the co-founder of Opower.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Jonathan Bush, the co-founder of Athenahealth, a cloud-based software enabled company that helps physicians manage patient's electronic medical records.

Harris also speaks with Dan Yates, the co-founder of Opower.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
